Uses of Class
de.stock.action.Action

  • Packages that use Action 
    Package Description
    de.stock.event  
    de.stock.event.types  
    de.stock.level  

    • Uses of Action in de.stock.event

      Subclasses of Action in de.stock.event 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Event
      Base class of events

      The event system knows two real types of events which start and stop without the players influence (they run a number of rounds)

      - MainEvent can start on his own or by another event.

      - SubEvent can be started by another event only.

      (These events can influence environments, tradeables (through environment groups) and other objects)

      Event developers must instantiate MainEvent or SubEvent
      They must not instantiate this class

    • Uses of Action in de.stock.event.types

      Subclasses of Action in de.stock.event.types 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MainEvent
      See Event for information about events

      The special about a MainEvent is that it can start on his own (or by another event)
      class  SubEvent
      See Event for information about events

      SubEvents can be started by another event only

    • Uses of Action in de.stock.level

      class  Level
      See ILevel for futher information
      class  LevelDecorator
      See ILevel for futher information
